summary: Phase 3 regression testing completed for Verified Sound A&R. All core UI pages (Homepage, Pricing, Login, Dashboard, Settings, Media) working correctly. Firebase authentication successful. Admin dashboard accessible. Security headers (HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options) present and properly configured.

critical.issue: Returns 500 error - Missing OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable

integration_issues.issue: Page times out when loading - likely due to missing Firebase Admin credentials (GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS is empty)

passed_tests: Homepage loads correctly with hero, feature cards, process steps, and chat toggle button
Pricing page displays all 3 tiers (Tier I $39, Tier II $89, Tier III $139)
Pricing monthly/annual toggle works correctly with proper price updates
Login page displays email/password form with login/signup toggle
Firebase authentication works - can login with test credentials
Dashboard loads for authenticated users with subscription overview cards
Dashboard shows Press Image Manager, Application Status, EPK Settings sections
Settings page displays profile form (artist name, email, genre, location, bio, social links)
Media page loads with Press Image Manager and upload button
Admin dashboard accessible for admin users (test user is admin)
Global chatbox opens/closes correctly with greeting message
Security headers present: HSTS, CSP, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, X-XSS-Protection, Referrer-Policy, Permissions-Policy
Navigation shows correct elements for logged-in state (Home, Pricing, Apply, Dashboard, Media, EPK, Settings, Sign out)
action_items: Add OPENAI_API_KEY to .env.local for chat assistant to work
Configure GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS for Firebase Admin SDK (required for public EPK pages)
CSP fix applied: Added https://www.google.com and https://www.gstatic.com to connect-src for reCAPTCHA
critical_code_review_comments: CSP Issue Fixed: connect-src was missing https://www.google.com for reCAPTCHA API calls - fix applied to middleware.ts
Missing env vars: OPENAI_API_KEY and GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS are required for full functionality

success_rate.backend: N/A (API routes not testable without credentials)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI pages working. Chat assistant needs OPENAI_API_KEY. Public EPK needs Firebase Admin credentials (GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS). CSP fix has been applied for reCAPTCHA. Test user verifiedsoundmedia@gmail.com has admin access.
